intro: Ternstroemia yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan ternstroemia, is a flowering plant species native to China. It belongs to the family Theaceae and is characterized by its evergreen leaves and showy, white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions. It has a compact growth habit and is often found in subtropical forests. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and nurseries.
